properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 8:18PM MST until January 15 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches, locally up to 18 inches near the Idaho border. Winds
gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Western Uinta
Mountains.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, including Sardine
Summit and Logan Summit.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may cause low visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM MST WEDNESDAY
